today.COMMENT: Technical: String representing today (for convenient input).;

yesterday.COMMENT: Technical: String representing yesterday (for convenient input).

tomorrow.COMMENT: Technical: String representing tomorrow (for convenient input).

weekdays.COMMENT: Full names for the Weekdays translations;

firstDayOfWeek.COMMENT: First day of the week. With default calendar we use ISO 8601: 'weekday' is 1=Mon ... 7=Sun;

shortDate.COMMENT: Technical: Must be a valid Angular Date pipe format.

shortDateNG.COMMENT: Technical: Must be a valid Angular Date pipe format.

longDate.COMMENT: Technical: Must be a valid Angular Date pipe format.

longDateNG.COMMENT: Technical: Must be a valid Angular Date pipe format.

dateTime.COMMENT: Technical: Must be a valid Angular Date pipe format.

dateTimeNG.COMMENT: Technical: Must be a valid Angular Date pipe format.
